text: _______ variables are variables created in runtime and are accessible via pointers
A sequence of instructions describing a solution for a given problem is called _______
_______ algorithms can be applied to every instance of a problem
_______ algorithms are always finite, always give a result
_______ algorithms are unambiguous in every moment, the algorithm consists of clearly given steps in a given order
Algorithms that always return the same output given the same input are ________
_________ algorithms are transparent (easily understandable), easily modifiable
_________ is a structured data type
An Array is a _______ data type
An Array of array is called ________ array
An Array of array is called ________ array
______ loop repeats a piece of code an unknown number of times until a condition is met.
______ loop repeats a piece of code a given number of times
A ______ is an independent set of statements that can be called in several places in a computer program
The property of subroutines called ______ allows it to be used many times
_________ and procedures are types of subroutines
Functions and _________ are types of subroutines
_______ always returns a value
_______ doesn't return a value
_______ explains the purpose of code
_______ is a collection of resources
Code executed without converting it into a machine code is called _______ code
Code executed by translating it into an executable is called _______ code
